title: Please fix Normals
body:
I think that normal games have a real downside from the moment you enter your champion select, it is not the calling lanes, it is simply the people that you are teamed up with, i have been teamed with people in Normal's lower than my Elo such as Bronze and Unranked, i understand that Normal games do not have MMR but if it where possible to have an option before queue to choose what type Elo you would like to vs (as long as it does not extend past your current tier and division), i think implementing this would give many users a better experience and would help the fact that when someone if trying to play a new champion they are playing it in their own division of their choice. I'm in Silver 4 at the moment and I'm not exactly in the current position to call myself "good" but i don't like being queued with some people that simply don't know what they are doing.
Thanks for reading this. 
Have a good one guys.
{{summoner:14}}  Targetzeroo {{summoner:14}}
